biotools.summary: Distant homology detection method based on sequence profile-profile comparison. It takes a protein sequence or multiple sequence alignment as input and searches for remote homologs in SCOP, PDB and PFAM databases.

bioschemas.name: COMA
bioschemas.summary: Distant homology detection method based on sequence profile-profile comparison. It takes a protein sequence or multiple sequence alignment as input and searches for remote homologs in SCOP, PDB and PFAM databases.
